Front End

  • Skills
  • Approach
  • Experience

The scores are relative to each other in the same class. These are based on my confidence/proficiency in practical use, basically the rating is higher in tech where I struggle less. This is in now way relative to mastery on each technology, there's always something out there I don't know yet.

I prefer using vanilla front end tech if the requirements are simple enough to allow it, otherwise I scale up. For mid-level complexity I reach for Backbone, and for single page applications - Angular.

I am wholly impartial to CSS frameworks like Bootstrap and Foundation, you can achieve similar effect with much less bloat.

I am looking forward to using React and Meteor in the future, when I come into a project that would imply their necessity.
